text.div:
V3 Value SetParticipationVerifier

A person who verifies the correctness and appropriateness of the service (plan, order, event, etc.) and hence takes on accountability.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ParticipationType where concept is-a VRF

name: v3.ParticipationVerifier
title: V3 Value SetParticipationVerifier
description: A person who verifies the correctness and appropriateness of the service (plan, order, event, etc.) and hence takes on accountability.
